title: Not Everything Is About Race & Drag Shows Can't Be 'Family-Friendly' | Daily Best of October 14 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Reporters are stunned when Tampa Bay head coach Todd Bowles doesn't allow the press to make the matchup about race as he prepares to take on Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin. A mom speaks some common sense at a town hall meeting as she states there's no such thing as a "family-friendly" drag show. Rural residents of Oregon are fed up with the entire western half of the state and look to join Idaho. Things get awkward on "The View" as Whoopi's former co-star finds out she won't be in "Sister Act 3." And, the Alabama-Tennessee game this weekend actually matters for the first time since before the iPhone came out.

content:encoded:
Reporters are stunned when Tampa Bay head coach Todd Bowles doesn't allow the press to make the matchup about race as he prepares to take on Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin. A mom speaks some common sense at a town hall meeting as she states there's no such thing as a "family-friendly" drag show. Rural residents of Oregon are fed up with the entire western half of the state and look to join Idaho. Things get awkward on "The View" as Whoopi's former co-star finds out she won't be in "Sister Act 3." And, the Alabama-Tennessee game this weekend actually matters for the first time since before the iPhone came out.
